title: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)
description: Implement TOTP-based 2FA using authenticator apps (Google Authenticator, Authy) for enhanced account security
notes: Critical for protecting user accounts and premium subscriptions

title: Rate Limiting on API Endpoints
description: Add rate limiting to all API endpoints to prevent abuse and DDoS attacks
notes: Use Cloudflare's built-in rate limiting or implement custom solution

title: Input Validation & Sanitization
description: Comprehensive input validation for all user inputs especially ad URLs and form fields
notes: Prevent XSS, SQL injection, and other OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities

title: Audit Logging System
description: Log all sensitive operations (login, password changes, subscription changes, admin actions)
notes: Essential for compliance and security monitoring

title: Session Management Improvements
description: Implement session timeout, concurrent session limits, and device management
notes: Allow users to view and revoke active sessions

title: CORS Configuration Hardening
description: Restrict CORS to specific allowed origins instead of allowing all
notes: Currently allows all origins - security risk

title: Content Security Policy (CSP)
description: Implement strict CSP headers to prevent XSS and data injection attacks
notes: Add via Cloudflare Workers or meta tags

title: Secure Cookie Configuration
description: Ensure all cookies have Secure, HttpOnly, and SameSite attributes properly set

title: Password Strength Requirements
description: Enforce strong password policies with complexity requirements
notes: Minimum length, special characters, no common passwords

title: Account Lockout Policy
description: Implement account lockout after failed login attempts with CAPTCHA
